overview: The documentary follows a group of meerkats in coping with their daily lives in the midst of vast Kalahari Desert in southern Africa. Various members are presented individually, social behavior and the handling and the role assignment illuminated with each other. The three-part documentary is seamlessly from the first episodes of the successful predecessor \"The Meerkat Gang\" and tells of thrilling adventures, the tight binding group and the family together the fascinating little terestrial animals.
title: Meerkats News - New adventures in the Kalahari Desert
